package day4;


class Demo{
	void div()  throws ArithmeticException{
		int n1=25;
	    int n2=0;
	    System.out.println(n1/n2);

	}
}
public class Example2Ecxeption {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Demo d=new Demo();
		try {
			d.div();
			
		}
		catch(Exception e){
			System.out.println("");
		}
            
	}

}
